mapper.sql:
FROM cpcpcp.infrCodeGroup WHERE 1=1
AND ifcgDelNy = 1 AND ifcgDelNy = 0
AND ifcgName LIKE concat('%',#{shIfcgName},'%')
AND ifcgName like concat('%',#{shValue},'%') AND ifcgNameEng like concat('%',#{shValue},'%')
mapper.select:
SELECT ifcgSeq , ifcgName , ifcgNameEng , ifcgDelNy
limit #{startRnumForMysql}, #{rowNumToShow}

SELECT a.ifcgSeq , a.ifcgName , a.ifcgDelNy FROM cpcpcp.infrCodeGroup a WHERE 1=1
AND a.ifcgSeq = #{ifcgSeq}

SELECT a.ifcgSeq , a.ifcgName , a.ifcgDelNy , b.ifcdSeq , b.ifcdName FROM cpcpcp.infrCodeGroup a LEFT JOIN cpcpcp.infrCode b on b.ifcgSeq = a.ifcgSeq WHERE 1=1
AND a.ifcgSeq = #{ifcgSeq}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM infrCodeGroup WHERE 1=1 AND ifcgSeq = #{ifcgSeq}
mapper.update: UPDATE infrCodeGroup SET ifcgDelNy = 1 WHERE 1=1 AND ifcgSeq = #{ifcgSeq}
mapper.select:
